A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This should've been a Star Wars movie with Disney elements\, but it is a Disney movie with Star Wars elements. HUGE DIFFERENCE. TFA was already going this way (Kylo took a hit from a stormtrooper with a light saber! In a Star Wars movie he would've just choked him\, but there's not much action there so Disney gave us an unacceptable battle) but TLJ destroyed the OT. I feel your pain\, Mark! If you liked the movie it's ok\, you are a Disney fan\, period.
